City News

View All News

  1. Updated PFOS/PFOA testing results and Joint Meeting Minutes

    Water Reclamation water testing results are available now. See Technical Reports below and Joint Meeting Minutes. As part of the investigation into potential concerns regarding PFAS1 (Per- and Polyfluoroalkyl Substances) at the City of Cocoa Beach More Information on New Water Test Results

  2. Reclaim Water OFF RESTRICTIONS!

    When reclaim is on restrictions you may only have water available on Tuesday, Thursday, and Saturday from 12:01 a.m. until 10 a.m., or may be shut off sooner depending on availability. More information about Water Restrictions
